src:
Masyarakat Masih Getol Belanja Bikin Ekonomi RI Tumbuh 5,02%
05 Nov 2019, 04:59 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat ada sejumlah penopang tumbuhnya ekonomi Indonesia di kuartal III-2019. Penopang paling besar ialah konsumsi rumah tangga.Kepala BPS Suhariyanto mengatakan konsumsi rumah tangga di kuartal III-2019 jadi penopang terbesar dalam pertumbuhan ekonomi. Sektor itu menyumbang 55,03% dari pertumbuhan ekonomi."Konsumsi rumah tangga masih dominasi sumbangan 55,03%" kata Suhariyanto di kantor BPS, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Suhariyanto mengatakan, konsumsi rumah tangga saat ini lebih tinggi dibanding saat kuartal III-2018."Kalau dibandingkan triwulan III-2018 sebetulnya konsumsi rumah tangga kita lebih bagus karena sebelumnya 5%. Sekarang naik sedikit 5,01%" jelasnya.Kondisi ini mencerminkan tingkat daya beli masyarakat yang masih tinggi. Komponen tertinggi konsumsi rumah tangga ialah kesehatan dan pendidikan."Total nilai kartu kredit tumbuh 10,41%. Menunjukkan konsumsi rumah tangga masih tumbuh. Pertumbuhan paling tinggi konsumsi rumah tangga dari komponen kesehatan dan pendidikan 7,34%" tuturnya.Simak Video "Sandi: Pemerintah Terjebak Dalam Pertumbuhan Ekonomi 5%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
The Community Still Groggy Shopping Makes Indonesia's Economy Grow 5.02%
05 Nov 2019, 04:59 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: Agung Pambudhy

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) noted that there are a number of supports for Indonesia's economic growth in the third quarter of 2019. The biggest pillar is household consumption. Head of BPS Suhariyanto said household consumption in the third quarter of 2019 was the biggest pillar in economic growth. The sector contributed 55.03% of economic growth. "Household consumption is still dominated by 55.03% contribution" Suhariyanto said at the BPS office, Jakarta, Tuesday (11/05/2019). Suhariyanto said, household consumption is currently higher compared to the third quarter-2018. "When compared to the third quarter-2018, actually our household consumption is better because previously it was 5%. Now it rises a little 5.01%" he explained. This condition reflects the level of people's purchasing power that is still high. The highest component of household consumption is health and education. "The total value of credit cards grew 10.41%. Indicates that household consumption is still growing. The highest growth in household consumption is from the health and education component 7.34%" he said. : Government Trapped In 5% Economic Growth "[Gambas: Video 20sec] (fdl / fdl)
